summary: "The Room" is a 2003 American movie about a love triangle set in San Francisco. Written, directed, and starring Tommy Wiseau, it's considered one of the worst films ever made but has become a cult classic due to its strange story and poor quality. Despite being a box-office failure, it gained popularity after release due to its unique badness. The film's behind-the-scenes story is told in the book and movie "The Disaster Artist." A new movie inspired by "The Room" is also in the works.
title: The Room
